input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Tanning salon treatment has a direct effect on skin. Going to the beach has a direct effect on skin. Method 1: We look directly at how tanning salon treatment correlates with skin in general. Method 2: We look at this correlation case by case according to going to the beach. To understand how tanning salon treatment affects skin, is it more correct to use the Method 1 than Method 2?
